content: TE-C (SDS Plus) Imperial hammer drill bit Premium SDS Plus (TE-C) hammer drill bit with 2-flute helix for drilling anchor holes into concrete ### Categories: Home > Products > Tool inserts > Concrete and masonry drill bits- - - ### FEATURES:Features Two cutting edges and a direct tip-to-helix transition – faster and more constant drilling speed over the bits entire lifetime Faster drilling progress – wide helix spine transports dust more efficiently Longer-lasting drill bits – optimized tip geometry and durable helix transition prolong the bits lifetime Ideal for use with a wide range of SDS Plus rotary hammers Applications Drilling in concrete and masonry ### TECHNICAL DATA: Connection end: TE-C (SDS Plus) Base material: Brick, Concrete, Masonry, Natural stone, Sand-lime block Head shape: 2 Cutters Technical Data | Connection end | TE-C (SDS Plus) | Base material | Brick, Concrete, Masonry, Natural stone, Sand-lime block | Working mode | Hammer drilling | Head shape | 2 Cutters | Head material composition | Tungsten carbide | Product Class | Premium ### ITEMS- 2341075 -
